author: nzola8
title: Cardano/Lokole Network integration
description: Cerca de 40% da população mundial não está conectada à Internet. Muito difícil para esta população o acesso ao sistema Cardano.

f6_assessments.q0: Cardano should adopt this proposal. It is in life with the more significant aim of Crypto and Cardano. There is considerable potential to uplift people by providing low-cost knowledge for which such low-cost devices use Rasbberi Pi to play an important role.
f6_assessments.q1: The Git hub site referenced is active and has high quality software. The team also has already demonstrated the capability and commitment by deploying online email in Kinshas. Therefore with this credentials there is a very high chance that the team will be able to complete the task successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is to integrate Cardano Ecosystem onto the Lokole Network system to enable the unconnected to access Cardano network. This is likely to have significant technical risk and the proposal does not have clarified the technical modalities. However, as a community, I believe that the proposals like these should be supported to encourage such initiatives.

f6_assessments.q0:
"The idea of creating a portable kit that can connect to the internet for places that don't have an internet connection is a great idea. Because it can help more people access and use the internet. Besides can help people connect to Cardano through the internet. Because without the internet, blockchain would be useless. So the impact of this proposal is very huge
But one problem is that the proposal does not have a specific goal and plan to bring the internet to those in need that can accelerate the development of Cardano.
"
f6_assessments.q1:
"The team of proposal is a group of Open Source developers, software engineers, coders and electronic technicians.Using Python, Microsoft Azure, Flask, GitHub, RPI. With experiences like this, the team is fully capable of implementing the project. Although there is no specific information about the number of group members as well as the personal information of the members. But through the team's github, I can see that this product has been implemented in practice and according to the information proposed by this product, it has actually worked in Canada, USA and Congo.

But I really don't know what the proposal wants to do next because I don't see a specific plan or roadmap for this proposal.
I really hope the team can bring a more specific plan to fund 8 maybe I will give the proposal 5 * but for this proposal, it is still very sketchy, not really meeting the basic requirements of a proposal in Catalyst."
f6_assessments.q2: I really like the product of the proposal but as a CA I really have to give this proposal a 1* in the auditibality section. Because although the proposal has an actual product, the proposer has not yet given a specific plan, key metrics, timeline, target or budget breadown in this proposal. Therefore, There is no way to audit this proposal

f6_assessments.q0: This proposer focuses on helping connect the unconnected by an off/online portable web and email network called "Lokole". It seems that this proposal is incomplete. The proposed solution is to integrate Cardano Ecosystem onto the Lokole Network system to enable the unconnected to access Cardano network. Conceptually, I think it has a certain fit for the challenge. The solution having satisfactory and has a potential impact on the Cardano ecosystem in Africa and worldwide if completed. For better understanding, the proposer should explain more about what is the plan to integrate Cardano Ecosystem onto the Lokole Network system to enable the unconnected to access the Cardano network, with specific goals, road map (integrated with measurable KPIs/metrics), Budget breakdown; and Risk/challenge [such an ambitous solution like this one may face potential risk, I suppose]. Based on the given information, I can not agree with this proposal's impact, and would give it a score of 2.
f6_assessments.q1: Through provided links (youtube and github), Lokole network is real and applied into reality, however, there is no plan that how the proposer would integrate that network to the Cardano Blockchain. It's difficult to evaluate and give advice. My advice would be: this idea is great and potential can be seen, however, integrating such a network into Cardano Blockchain require a detailed plan [with roadmap, KPIs, and of course the risk]. Therefore, based on the given information, I strongly disagree with this proposal's feasible, and would give it with a score of 1."
f6_assessments.q2:
For an incomplete proposal like this, auditability / transparency can't be guaranteed. There is quite a lot of information of the Lokole Network istself, however, there is no plan of how to integrate that into the Cardano network, as solution proposed.
Therefore, based on the given information, I disagree with this proposal's auditability and would give it a score of 2.

solution: Construímos uma rede de e-mail e web portátil off/online chamada "Lokole" para ajudar a conectar o desconectado.
experience: Grupo de desenvolvedores de código aberto, engenheiros de software, codificadores e técnicos eletrônicos, utilizando Python, Microsoft Azure, Flask, GitHub, RPI.
